categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Lily Nyamwasa is an actress who was originally supposed to replace Gin Clarke in the role of Adi Gallia for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, but ended up playing a different Jedi High Council member, Stass Allie (she was found to be different from Clarke), in both this movie and Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.

At present Nyamwasa is actively involved with the charity ROAR (Rwandan Orphan Assistance Response) while continuing with her career path. The charity, which is run in Sydney Australia, aims to improve life quality -in particular, school education and health of disadvantaged youth in rural Rwanda. The charity can be found on facebook and on the website roarcharity.org/.
In Attack of the Clones, she said it was sad to see so many dead jedi on the ground and has tears in her eyes.
